div.div:
Pure - March 22, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 2.1.3
Pretty - I like it
I like how the butterflies swoosh out wherever you touch the screen. I wish the butterflies moved more naturally, but overall the colorfulness is nice.

jodi - April 22, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 2.1.3
Like it
Enjoy this app

L - March 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.2
Beautiful!
Using with a native wildflower photo I took last Summer. Love the ability to customize(especially the butterfly types!)This is going to be my fave wallpaper!! Great job!

Laurel - March 6, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 2.1.2
Awesome!
Love it! Way cool that you can customize the butterflies.

Stacy - March 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.1.2
SD card option is very nice & the chime like sound.

Lisa - February 26, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 2.1.2
Fun!
Beautiful and fun! Great on Moto Razr.

Jessica - February 12, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 2.1.2
Love It!
Absolutly love it! Motorola Electrify!

Costrak - February 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.1
Perfect
on Samsung Galaxy SII !

Janie - February 9, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.1
JT
used to be great but doesn't load after last update.

shelly - July 14, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 2.0.3
Very pretty. Like the option of chosing your own background.

Robin - November 26, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.0.3
I have never had a better wallpaper. I've never not used it. Other ones ...
I have never had a better wallpaper. I've never not used it. Other ones I have used but I always go back. Xoxo

Mike - November 9, 2011 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 2.0.3
Great app.
I luv it!

Zee - December 19, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 2.0.3
Butterflies
Pretty cool but when I set a wallpaper it reverts back to the default wallpaper when I turn my phone off/on. Please fix.

Beautiful

susan - October 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.0.2

I love this app! Beautiful! Thank you to the creator(s).

SIMPLY BEAUTIFUL!!! I love that u can choose ur own background AND butterflies, ...
SIMPLY BEAUTIFUL!!! I love that u can choose ur own background AND butterflies, highly recommend!!!! Samsung Vibrant Galaxy S.

Lilly - March 8, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.3.1
Love it on droid x. Many options. Easy to navigate & change. Relaxing. Not ...
Love it on droid x. Many options. Easy to navigate & change. Relaxing. Not choppy at all on droid x. Worth the cost.

Purrpussful - April 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.1
Oh, dear! Though the butterflies are lovely, their animation just isn't realistic ...
Oh, dear! Though the butterflies are lovely, their animation just isn't realistic at all!! I'm sorry, but I'd like a refund, please. : (

Angela - April 9, 2011 - Version 1.3.1
I love that you can pick the colors of the butterflies.

April 9, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.3.1
Lovely butterflies and graphics.

Jane - February 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.1
I love this app.. Samsung vibrant

Stacy - May 7, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.1

Please make an option to store in sd card external memory instead of clogging up the internal memory space that is limited. Thanks.

kt - December 12, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.3

Very pretty. Performance is fine on HTC Evo. Developer is responsive and kind. Alternate backgrounds available for download.

BUTTERFLY LIVE WALLPAPER:
Wow...this is beautiful! This latest update is amazing. I'm loving it!!!

Love it! Relaxes me if I just look at it for a minute or two :-)

Seems like all the girls like this wallpaper. Movements are choppy, background needs to follow swipe. Meh.

Favorite wallpaper by far.... simply gorgeous. I love that you can set your own photo as the background. Makes me smile every time I use my phone!!
